name: Bitter Extinction
description:
Bitter Extinction is a tower defence shooter, with a dieselpunk aesthetic. You are commissioned with fortifying an abandoned mining colony. The catch is this glacial planet is home to metal devouring creatures, evolving as they feast on your defences. Extinction is the only way.

Place turrets and traps to defend your position. Kill all aliens with the help of guns you can purchase and save the mining colony from inevitable death.

This is a game made by a team of 2nd year Falmouth University students. Enjoy our unique spin on the action tower-defence genre!

How to install:

  1. Download the .zip file.
  2. Unpack the folder
  3. Open the BitterExtinction.exe file
  4. Enjoy the game!
